info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 3:31PM EDT until July 08 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN MASON...CABELL AND PUTNAM COUNTIES... At 331 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Milton, or 10 miles north of Hamlin, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Huntington, Nitro, Winfield, Proctorville, Hurricane, Barboursville, Milton, Eleanor, Buffalo, Poca, Ona, Culloden, Teays Valley, Bancroft, Crown City, Athalia, Ashton, Pea Ridge, Green Bottom and Fraziers Bottom. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
